sentences.english: Liddy, the master's great-granddaughter, was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.chinese: 丽蒂是作坊师傅的重孙女，和巴丝谢芭年龄相仿。

sentences.english: I delightedly hugged and greeted my grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 我愉快地拥抱了我的孙子孙女，和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Tops nanna getting her grand-kiddy a soy milk treat.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶给她的孙女买一个豆奶点心。
所有的孙女孙子辈都在那。

sentences.english: Mr Grant dotes on his granddaughter. She's the apple of his eye.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特先生很溺爱他的小孙女，她是他的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: They set up a family trust for their grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 他们为其孙子孙女成立了家庭托拉斯。

sentences.english: He has just diapered his granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 他刚给孙女儿换完尿布。

sentences.english: My girl eats well and she likes to come to this school.
sentences.chinese: 我的孙女在这里吃得好，她很喜欢来学校。

sentences.english: The couple has one daughter and one granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇有一个女儿和一个外孙女。

sentences.english: The granddaughter of the Goddess of Heaven visited the earth.
sentences.chinese: 王母娘娘的外孙女下凡到人间。

sentences.english: Second grand-daughter is junior middle school 2 years.
Rajani was Mr. M's granddaughter, the child of his oldest married daughter.
sentences.chinese: 拉贾尼是M先生长女的女儿，他的外孙女。

sentences.english: My granddaughter is as ptty as a little doll.
sentences.chinese: 我孙女像小洋娃娃一样漂亮。

sentences.english: Many grandparents buy a set of dolls for their first granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 许多祖父母为他们的第一个孙女购买郑涛的玩偶。

sentences.english: Blessed with five lovely grandchildren, the old couple feel content.
sentences.chinese: 有五个可爱的孙子孙女，这对老夫妻感到很满足。

sentences.english: His mother's name was Athaliah, a granddaughter of Omri king of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲名叫亚他利雅，是以色列王暗利的孙女。

definition: daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
